history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: euclid. qsimpl time: 1 use: euclid. qsimpl time: 1 use: le_0_n,le_n,euclid,le_trans. qsimpl time: 1 use: le_n,ge,euclid,le_0_n,le_trans.

exceptions.tactic: destruct (euclid n d H) as [q [r [Hqr Hr]]].
exceptions.exn: In environment n, d : nat H : d <> 0 The term "d" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "?d <> 0".

exceptions.tactic: exists q, (if 2 * q * d <= n then r else d - r).
exceptions.exn: The reference q was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference q was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: split; [apply le_trans with (m := r); [apply le_0_n|apply le_n]|].
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

original: intros H. destruct (euclid n d H) as [q [r [Hqr Hr]]]. exists q, (if 2 * q * d <= n then r else d - r). split. - destruct (2 * q * d <= n). -- split; [apply le_trans with (m := r); [apply le_0_n|apply le_n]|]. -- split; [unfold ge; apply le_0_n|].
